thread.title: NBA Trade Deadline 2017: Get the latest news and rumors on Cleveland Cavaliers, Paul George and Jahlil Okafor
thread.title_full: NBA Trade Deadline 2017: Get the latest news and rumors on Cleveland Cavaliers, Paul George and Jahlil Okafor

author: Chris Fedor, cleveland.com
title: NBA Trade Deadline 2017: Get the latest news and rumors on Cleveland Cavaliers, Paul George and Jahlil Okafor
text: As per usual, the Cleveland Cavaliers are at the center of the chatter, expected to be one of the teams seeking win-now moves if they can pull something off.
